crisis.name: Political repression of West Paupans
crisis.description: Since Indonesia gained control of West Papua from the Dutch, West Papuans have faced political repression from the Indoesian government, resulting in many killed and having their human rights violated.
crisis.economic_impact: Transmigration program failed, failed to improve the situation of migrants, new location was not as productive.
crisis.help: http://www.freewestpapua.org/ holds various campaigns and have links for donations.

crisis.name: 2008 Sichuan Earthquake
crisis.description: A deadly earthquake of magniture 8.0Ms and 7.9Mw hit the province of Sichuan in China on May 12, 2008. It is also known as the Wenchuan earthquake after the location of its epicenter Wenchuan county.
crisis.economic_impact: China's government planned to spend $146.5 billion dollars to rebuild the areas that were damaged.

crisis.name: Persecution of Falun Gong practitioners
crisis.description: Practitionors of Falun Gong, meditation exercises, are now being persecuted by the Chinese Community Party. The decision was made by leader Jiang Zemin in 1999. There have been various means of persectuion from torture and forced labor to alleged organ harvesting.

crisis.name: 2011 Rio de Janiero floods and mudslides
crisis.description: A series of floods and mudslides hit several towns in the state of Rio de Janiero on January 11th, causing damage to homes and buildings as well as resulting in deaths.
crisis.economic_impact: Damages totaled 2 billion Reais (1.2 billion U.S. Dollars).
crisis.help: Donations and volunteer work can be done to help out.
